properties.areaDesc: St Joseph to South Haven MI; Pentwater to Manistee MI; Grand Haven to Whitehall MI; South Haven to Holland MI; Holland to Grand Haven MI; Whitehall to Pentwater MI
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued February 13 at 3:51PM EST until February 15 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds 15 to 30
knots tonight with waves of 6 to 10 feet subsiding to 3 to 5
feet. For the Gale Watch on Saturday, southwest gales of 35 to
40 knots with waves of 6 to 12 feet.

* WHERE...St Joseph to Manistee.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 AM EST Friday.
For the Gale Watch, from late Friday night through Saturday
evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds and waves will gradually subside
tonight into Friday morning. A lull in the activity will occur
Friday afternoon and evening. Late Friday night into Saturday
southwest gales will develop with large waves expected,
especially north of Grand Haven.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST FRIDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING
